description: Classify input into predefined categories - assigning data to specific groups
useCase: Categorizing incidents by type (e.g., 'Physical Injury', 'Property Damage', 'Near Miss', 'Behavioral Event')

categories.example: Physical Injury, Property Damage, Near Miss, Behavioral Event

input.example: A participant became agitated during lunch and threw a plate, breaking it on the floor. No one was injured.
